speaker: Elder Rowan
text: Ah, young grovekeeper! The forest grows stronger with your care. What wisdom can I share today?

choices.label: Any advice for a new keeper?

speaker: Elder Rowan
text: Water your saplings regularly — it doubles their growth speed. And plant near water tiles for even better results. Rain does the watering for you, if you're patient.

speaker: Elder Rowan
text: Explore beyond the grove! The forest trail leads to new clearings where rare species grow wild. Harvest mature trees for timber and sap — they're the lifeblood of our village.

speaker: Hazel
text: Welcome to my trading post! I've got the best rates in Grovekeeper Valley. What'll it be?

speaker: Hazel
text: I trade timber for sap, sap for fruit, and fruit for acorns. Better rates than you'll find anywhere else! The seasonal market changes prices too — keep an eye on that.

speaker: Botanist Fern
text: Oh! A fellow nature enthusiast! I've been cataloguing every species in the valley. Would you help me with some research?

speaker: Botanist Fern
text: I'm studying the growth patterns of different species. Plant at least 5 different species and grow one to Old Growth stage — that would give me incredible data! I'll make it worth your while.

speaker: Botanist Fern
text: The ancient forest to the southeast has Redwoods and Ironbarks — the hardiest species around. And if you ever find a Ghost Birch... well, those are truly special. They glow at night!

speaker: Blossom
text: Hello, dear! Looking for something special to plant? I've collected seeds from all across the valley!

speaker: Blossom
text: Cherry Blossoms are simply gorgeous — petals float through the air when they're mature! Golden Apples are practical too — wonderful fruit yields. Take your pick!
